author: Rachel Bachman
title: What to Watch in the Final Four
text:
Saturday’s Final Four will feature two of the hottest men’s college basketball teams in the country (plus a nun) in one game, and the top-ranked remaining teams in the other.
The early game pits No. 3 Michigan and its 13-game winning streak against No. 11 Loyola-Chicago, its 14-game streak and its most famous fan and 98-year-old chaplain, Sister Dolores Schmidt. The second features No. 1 seeds Kansas and Villanova.
Here...
